message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a lot
I understand you want a bit more, but I need a larger share to make it worthwhile.  This offer is fair given the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. We both lose if this goes on much longer.
